librecipe

Class Ingredient

  • java.lang.Object
    • librecipe.Saveable
      • librecipe.Ingredient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Ingredient>

    public class Ingredient
extends Saveable
implements java.lang.Comparable<Ingredient>
    Stores details on the quantity of an ingredient.
